results.question: How can you forward a spam email as an attachment using Microsoft Outlook on Windows?
results.answer:
To forward a spam email as an attachment using Microsoft Outlook on Windows, follow these steps:

1. Open the email you want to forward.
2. Click on the "More" button (the three-dot icon) at the top of the message pane.
3. Select "Forward as Attachment" from the dropdown menu.
4. A new message window will open with the original email attached as a `.eml` file. 
5. Enter the email address of the recipient in the "To" field.
6. Add any additional message you want in the body of the email.
7. Click "Send" to forward the email as an attachment. 

Note: The exact wording or options might vary slightly depending on your version of Outlook.
